snippet.title: Going Medieval | Announcement Trailer |
snippet.description:
Add Going Medieval to your Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1029780/Going_Medieval/

Sign-up for the Going Medieval Beta: https://bit.ly/GoingMedievalBeta 

Going Medieval is an alternate medieval history colony survival sim, where you can build a multi-story fortress out of clay, wood, and stone. Your villagers will have needs, feelings, and agendas shaped by the world and its history, and it's up to you to keep them content and sane. Help your villagers claim and defend their own piece of land!

Developed by Foxy Voxel & Published by The Irregular Corporation.


--------------------


Find out more:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/going_medieval
Discord: discord.gg/yHKcJat 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/goingmedievalgame/
